traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison and has resistance to poison damage

traits.name: Divine Eminence
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy * 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, guiding bolt, sanctuary * 2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, spiritual weapon * 3rd level (2 slots): dispel magic, spirit guardians
